translation: 软件锁解决方案有限公司\n“你的安全就是我们的安全”\n>\ 欢迎使用

original: Nevada National Security Site Maintenance:\n\nWelcome, User.
translation: 内华达州国家安全设施维护部门：\n\n用户，您好。

original: ERROR #K1\n"Array damaged or disconnected"\n"Check all cords and plugs for connection"
translation: 错误 #K1\n"阵列损坏或断线"\n"请检查全部线路和插头的连接状况"

translation: 软件锁解决方案有限公司\n“你的安全就是我们的安全”\n>\ 欢迎使用

original:
Nevada Test Site Personal Terminal:


>\ Welcome, USER
translation:
内华达试验场个人终端：


>\欢迎，用户
尸鬼掠夺者藏身处储藏钥匙
辐射避难所安全室钥匙
辐射避难所操作中心钥匙

original:
Out of the safehouse, I crouch furtively as my senses reveal an equally furtive threat. A quick mountaintop climb and I've avoided 6 Tunnelers. Some were dripping with venom.

Time slows to a crawl. Looks like I'm all out of Ultrajet...

They retreated- Or did they? The ground around me starts to quake; I dart as far as my legs can take me towards Goodsprings. Some friends were made on the way: 8-10 ghouls came for dinner, 1 being a goddamn Roamer. I would've died if it weren't for a fellow survivor, who took out 6 of the abominations before being torn apart. I left him for dead and climbed the nearest roof.

Now, I have to wait, to take it slowwwww, so fucking slow. I can't stand it. I need some Jet and I need it now. 8 attempts later I manage to grab the guy's backpack and climb another roof. The Ferals still look at me like I'm a walking sandwich, but they don't realize what I just found.

Fast as a Nightstalker, I jump around and bait the bastards back to the quaking caves. The slaughtering championship of Tunnelers vs Ghouls begins! Shit was even better than that Deathclaw fight over at the Thorn. The last man standing is revealed to be the Venomous Tunneler, to no one's surprise. I take out my BB Gun, and by the power of UltraJet, I dump 4 mags into him and kill the motherfucker. Due to my shaking hands, I missed most shots.

Half of my ammo gone and I barely moved from the starting position. Sweet Mother of Mercy-
translation:
离开藏身处，我警觉地蹲下，我的感官告诉我一个同样潜藏的威胁。我迅速爬上山顶，避开了六个掘穴者。其中一些还滴着毒液。

时间仿佛停滞不前。看来我的超级杰特已经用完了……

他们撤退了——还是没有？我周围的地面开始震动；我迅速朝清泉镇跑去，双腿能跑多远就跑多远。路上遇到了一些朋友：八到十个尸鬼过来觅食，其中一个还是该死的游荡者。如果不是另一位幸存者先干掉了六个怪物，我恐怕早就死了。他后来被撕成碎片，我抛下他爬上最近的屋顶。

现在，我必须等待，慢慢来，慢得让人受不了。我受不了了。我需要一些超级杰特，而且我现在就需要。八次尝试后，我终于抢到了那家伙的背包，又爬上了另一座屋顶。那些尸鬼仍然像看三明治一样看着我，但他们不知道我刚发现了什么。

我身手敏捷地跳来跳去，把这群混蛋引回到震动的洞穴。掘穴者与尸鬼的屠杀比赛开始了！这比之前在荆棘镇与死亡爪的战斗还要精彩。不出所料，最后站着的是那只带毒的掘穴者。我掏出我的BB枪，凭借超级杰特的力量，朝他倾泻了四梭子子弹，终于干掉了这个混蛋。由于我的手在颤抖，我射空了好多发。

一半的弹药都用完了，我却几乎没有离开起始位置。仁慈的圣母啊——

original: Damned be those big lizards near the church! One of them Power Armored fellows made a run for it towards it, a fool's suicide no less. Even worse, it seems he seemed to carry the codes to access that bunker and now they're right in the frying pan. It would be suicide to try retrieve it from their region, we'll just have to hope to get big enough arsenal to fend them off for good.
translation: 教堂附近那些大蜥蜴真是该死！其中一个穿动力甲的家伙朝着它们冲了过去，无异于自寻死路。\n更糟糕的是，他似乎还拿着进入那个掩体的密码，现在他们正处于水深火热之中。\n从他们手中夺回密码是自杀行为，我们只能寄希望于拥有足够强大的武器库来永久性地抵挡住他们。

original:
Gosh darn with these Bloatflies! Never have I ever seen something as nasty as these critters. Not only are they extremely aggressive, but they also blow up to smithereens if you even dare point a gun at them.
Managed to blow a section off from these caves. Now all I need to do is to get out through the gate and hightail it to Primm.

I do hope I could get to see the Vicky and Vance casino, just one more time...
translation:
天呐，这些辐射蝇真讨厌！我从没见过比这些小生物更恶心的东西。它们不仅极具攻击性，而且只要你敢用枪指着它们，它们就会爆炸成碎片。

我设法炸开了洞穴的一部分。现在我只需要通过门口，快速赶往普瑞姆。

我真的很希望我能再去一次维姬和万斯赌场...

original: Geez! Got locked here in the empty room with bunch of Deathclaws outside. Rushed too fast and managed to get their attention, now the boss and few others are having to deal with them. No matter what, we're not going to open this door for anybody until those lizards are gone.
translation: 该死！被锁在这空荡荡的房间里，外面还围着许多死亡爪。冲得太快引起它们注意了，现在老板和几个伙计正在对付它们。无论如何，这些蜥蜴没走之前，我们不会给任何人开门。

original: This holodisk contains the necessary privileges to access terminals inside Radiated Bunker.
translation: 这个全息卡带包含进入辐射掩体内终端的必要权限。

original: Ever since few of our brethen succumbed to depravity, irradiated food didn't cut it anymore. They want fresh food. An idea has spread around to try and feed those who have failed to succumb to radiation and become one of us, but I have my doubts they want that. They are more suicidal rather than hunger driven, given how they like to lash out towards anybody, and I do believe the only reason we're not getting our ass kicked is thanks to them remembering still who they are when staring at us.
translation:
自从我们的一些同胞堕落之后，辐射食品就再也无法满足他们了。

他们渴望新鲜食物。现在流传着一个想法，那就是尝试喂养那些未能屈服于辐射并成为我们一员的人，但我对他们是否真的想要这样表示怀疑。

他们更像是自杀倾向而非饥饿驱使，考虑到他们喜欢对任何人发起攻击，我相信我们之所以没有受到他们的攻击，只是因为他们在盯着我们看时，还记得自己是谁。

original: Moved out the remaining stools and tables into the small room. We should pick up the pace on securing this place as our new base, since it's only a matter of time before those wasps down south notice our activity and decide to make this a new hornest nest. Wouldn't want to stay inside when that happens...
translation: 我把剩下的凳子和桌子都搬到了小房间里。我们应该加快把这个地方作为我们新基地的安全保障，因为那些南方的黄蜂迟早会注意到我们的活动，并决定把这里当作新的蜂巢。我可不想在那种情况发生时还待在里面...

original: Fuck this shit! Got separated from others who headed north, and I can't get back south to others thanks to heavy NCR presence. Those guys in blue convict suits are also not the most friendliest bunch of people.\nCould be worse; a shack inside a cave full of geckos. If I can gather up enough of brethen down the road, they could be safe here.
translation: 我认为在这个洞穴里设置避难所是个好主意。\n鉴于这些放射性桶，没有哪个神志正常的人会进来这里。这个临时的棚屋足够坚固，足以把那些愚蠢的蜥蜴挡在外面，不过当我朝它们开枪时，它们似乎并没有真的领会到要永远离开。 \n其他人告诉我，由于普瑞姆和莫哈维哨站附近的NCR部队，向南走就是死路一条，但这个地方足以作为避难所，无论我什么时候受伤都可以在这里藏身和恢复。

original: More scavengers are looking out for this place. Had to start trapping out the cave and keep geckos alive. One of those gangsters nearly got in here, but bleed off to the tunnels. Saw him carrying bunch of charges and figured I might as well mine the free road to here, it's not like I have another spare door to jam to the other side.
translation: 我最近在路上都没有看到什么商队或者商贩，只有一些拾荒者和变异蟑螂。\n不知道北方是不是出了什么事。也许是那些白痴把想走这条路的人都吓跑了？我总说他们老在路上晃荡，会把那些微不足道的小商贩都吓跑。

original:
Well ain't this my luck. I bagged me an NCR Trooper, and alive at that! Didn't believe NCR to send out people to investigate random caves. She's a looker, much finer than any of the ghoul babes I've met, but she's got a fuckin mouth on her! She wouldn't stop screaming for help, that she was gonna be eaten by a zombie, so I busted her kneecaps and let her take a "nap" next to the rad barrels.
We'll see how she likes her face rotting off her body.

Off to find more whiskey - I've already gone through two bottles today. I miss the days when I could get drunk easily.
translation:
我抓到一个NCR士兵，还是活的！她长得很漂亮，比我见过的任何僵尸小妞都漂亮得多，但她嘴巴真他妈贱！她一直尖叫着求救，说僵尸要吃她，所以我打断了她的膝盖骨，让她在辐射桶旁边“小睡”一下。

我们看看她喜不喜欢自己脸上的肉烂掉。

去找更多的威士忌——我今天已经喝了两瓶了。我怀念过去能轻易喝醉的日子。

original: Sergeant Jean Lucard told me to scout out the Ivanpah Solar Power Facility, hoping to reactivate this place for more power. Personally, I think it's a joke to even consider it; most of the dishes are buried underneath the sand, not to mention the abundance of radioactive barrels, some even unsealed. Odd that they found their way here, though.
translation: 士官让·卢卡尔让我去勘察伊万帕太阳能发电站，希望重新启用它来提供更多的电力。我个人觉得这个想法很可笑；大多数的天线都埋在沙下面了，更别说那些大量的放射性桶了，有些还是未密封的。不过他们居然能找到这里，真是奇怪。

original: After having navigated this place, the sewers seem to lead into a crater up West. Nothing there aside from Ghouls, and I'm not too keen on getting radiation poisoning either. I've recovered some files, but nothing useful has come up. No surprises there.
translation: 穿过这个地方后，下水道似乎通向西边的一个火山口。那里除了尸鬼什么都没有，我也不想去染上辐射病。我已经恢复了一些文件，但还没有出现任何有用的东西。意料之中，没什么可惊讶的。

original: Something unbelievable happened. A squad of Ghouls, armed to the teeth, brought out a pack of Ferals over here. I must report posthaste to Camp McCarran, this threat must be assessed with immediately.
translation: 发生了一件不可思议的事。一支武装到牙齿的尸鬼小队把一群狂尸鬼带到了这里。我必须马上向麦克卡伦营地报告，必须立即评估这个威胁。

original: Protectons in observatory has been having an odd behaviour of threatening for humans to leave due to place being closed out, propably a case of no maintance given to them for 200 years. It's impressive they are still running, but if I want to see what somebody has holed up inside of the tower, I guess there's no options left but to breach it by force.
translation: 天文台的护卫者机器人们一直有着奇怪的行为，威胁人类离开因为这里已经关闭，可能是因为他们两百年没有得到维护。他们仍然在运行，这令人印象深刻，但如果我想看看到底是谁躲在塔里，我猜我别无选择，只能强行闯入。

original: Once as a small group, months ago we navigated ourselves inside this abandoned military apartment, where no living soul has touched for over 200 years. It is funny how old nuclear test site is still active on radiation, especially strong around the craters. This does give us perfect hiding place from any forces who are not prepared to take caution on advancing to this radiated shithole.\nAside from the ruins of the town that was used to benchmark how cities handle the nuclear devastation, it seems to be that the Great War has opened up a hidden bunker, which is located inside one of the craters. The radiation in that place is incredibly high, which wouldn't be a problem, but it seems that either it contained inside Deathclaws, or Deathclaws had become irratiaded thanks to the all radiation here and has set up a shop around it. One has to wonder if there's something valuable inside of it. The man in power armor denies any information or knowledge about said bunker, but being locked in a room with radiation surely gives him time to open up his loose lips.
translation:
几个月前，我们曾作为一支小分队，自己摸索进这个废弃的军事公寓，这里已经两百多年没有活人踏足了。

有趣的是，这个老旧的核试验场仍然散发着辐射，尤其是那些弹坑周围，辐射强度特别大。这让这里成为我们躲避任何未做好防范准备就贸然进入这个辐射地带的势力的绝佳藏身之地。
除了被用作衡量城市如何处理核灾难的基准的小镇废墟外，大战似乎还开启了一个隐藏的地堡，它位于其中一个弹坑内。

那里的辐射强度极高，这本不是问题，但似乎地堡里藏有死亡爪，或者死亡爪因这里的辐射而变异，并在此地安营扎寨。人们不禁会想，地堡里是否藏有什么珍贵的东西。

穿动力装甲的那个人拒绝提供有关该地堡的任何信息或知识，但被关在有辐射的房间里，肯定会让他忍不住开口的。

original: This is it. The bunker has been breached by atom bomb. Radiation alarms went blasting as soon as the trembling started, and it might be not that long before were all dead from radiation poisoning. There's no way we could possibly outlast the atomic fallout on our lifetime with limited supplies to treat radiation poisoning.\nSuperiors told us to evacuate to the lower levels of the bunker to wait until worst has gone out. They told me to inform this urgently to the others, who are oblivious to the current situation. Oh what am I kidding, I can't bring myself to deliver death sentence to my fellow members. Let them hang with each other to the bitter end. I'll leave the key to the lower level access here and as for me, I decide to go out on my own terms.
translation:
就这样了。这座地堡已被原子弹突破。
当颤抖开始时，辐射警报就拉响了，我们可能很快都会死于辐射中毒。凭借有限的治疗辐射中毒的资源，我们绝对撑不到辐射尘埃散去的那一天。

上级告诉我们疏散到地堡的底层，等待最坏的情况过去。他们让我赶紧通知那些对目前情况一无所知的人。

哦，我在开什么玩笑，我没办法给我的同伴下达死亡判决。让他们一起自生自灭吧。我把通往底层的钥匙留在这儿，至于我，我决定以自己的方式离开。

original: Mister Williams was the first one to propose celebration in memory of America now that Great War has started, since it is unlikely we are about to walk on a surface in a long time. It is very pleasant, if a little bit claustrophobic due to small spaces, but given that only few selective of us got initiated to this bunker, let alone to continue experimenting with testing Red Glare on field deployment, there's not rooms left spare for anybody who would try to get in. It is odd Mr. Williams himself is not present here in the living room...
translation:
威廉姆斯先生是第一个提议举办庆祝活动来纪念美国的人，因为大战已经打响，我们很可能很长时间都不会在陆地上行走了。

这令人十分愉快，不过由于空间太小，有些令人窒息，但考虑到只有我们中少数几个人才能进入这个地堡，更不用说继续实验在战场上部署“红色风暴”了，所以这里已经没有多余的空间让其他人进来了。
奇怪的是，威廉姆斯先生本人并没有出现在起居室里……

original: I want this to be addressed to every single member of this bunker. Radiation leak has occured, and everybody needs to take shelter at the operations center. Failure to meet the demands gets people left behind locked out.
translation: 我想对这里每个人说这句话。已经发生辐射泄漏，所有人都需要在作战中心避难。无法满足要求的人会被抛弃在外。

original: There's no way out! The quake caused half of the quarters get buried underneath the rubble and the door won't budge at all! Geiger counter is ticking like crazy!\nFOR THE LOVE OF GOD HELP ME! I DONT WANT TO DIE LIKE THIS!
translation: 没有出路了！地震导致一半的街区被埋在废墟之下，门也纹丝不动！盖革计数器疯狂地滴答作响！\n看在上帝的份上帮帮我吧！我不想这样死去！

original: Eureka! Turns out the giant Spore Plants don't act aggressively towards their own specimen. Well, that's rather obvious. More specifically though, this intertwined passivity seems to stem not from the plants' intellects, but by innately recognizing plant-like odors as friendly. Having collected enough leaves to make a plant-like robe, I adorned it and became one with the plants. I wonder if this similarly holds true for the Night Stalkers that inhabit the Western side of these mountains...
translation: 啊！原来巨型孢子植物不会对自己的同类表现出攻击性。好吧，这也挺显而易见的。\n不过具体来说，这种行为似乎并非源自植物的智力，而是它们天生就能识别出类似植物的气味并将其视为友好的象征。\n我收集了足够的树叶，做了一件像植物一样的长袍，穿在身上，与植物融为一体。不知道这种原理是否同样适用于居住在这些山脉西侧的夜行兽...

original:
Jane,

By the time you are reading this, I'm dead. I didn't want it to end like this but worst had come out.

I've set up a camp on top of Mount Charleston and look over the ski lodge that has been taken over by super mutants. I suspect that I will die getting caught, if the wildlife here doesn't get me first.

Whatever is the case, don't mourn of me much. I backed down from many opportunities of glory, and I deserted my troops. I have been a coward in my life, I am afraid of dying. But I know that will eventually happen here, given my actions. It's only God's will to have me punished.

I only hope you can forgive me for not being strong enough.

Matthew
translation:
简,

当你读到这封信的时候，我已经死了。我并不想以这样的方式结束，但最坏的情况还是发生了。

我在查尔斯顿山顶扎营，俯瞰着那座被超级变种人占领的滑雪小屋。我怀疑我最后会死于被抓，如果这里的野生动物没有先对我下手的话。

不论如何，不要太过悲伤。我错过了许多荣耀的机会，也抛弃了我的战友。我一生懦弱，害怕死亡。但我也知道，鉴于我的所作所为，我终将难逃此劫。这只是上帝的旨意，让我受到惩罚。

我只希望，你能原谅我不够坚强。

马修

original: Rash, you won't believe what just happened. Few days ago area around Searchlight got heavily irradiated and some of these football sport clothing wearing weirdos came down here to try and make ruckus. The place is ideal, NCR troops has gone feral there, up for taming. The only problem is those radscorpions, maybe one of their nests got broken or something? Either way, we clear out those critters, and then seek to have the town for us.
translation: 拉斯，你不会相信刚才发生了什么。几天前，塞尔查特附近地区受到了严重的辐射污染，一些穿着奇装异服的家伙来到这里，试图制造骚乱。\n这个地方很理想，NCR军队已经在那里变得疯狂了，等待着我们去驯服他们。唯一的问题就是那些辐射蝎，也许是他们的巢穴被破坏了？\n无论如何，我们先清理这些怪物，然后设法占领这个城镇。
露西·格雷山地基地建筑群
拉斯维加斯最后一站餐厅
